key.name: dataset-folder-template
key.description:
Define the template to be used for creating full dataset folders. All folders will be created within the session top-level direction. You can use variables for substituting context-specific values. Available variables include {session}, {crystal}, {group}, {container}, {port}, {date}.
For example: /{date}/{group}/{crystal}/data/
